comments: Obtained by simply fitting a fifth degree polynomial to the terms 6,39,78,95,82,4 (see A058897).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
prog: (PARI) { for (n = 0, 200, a=6 + 33*n + 6*binomial(n,2) - 28*binomial(n,3) + 20*binomial(n,4) - 47*binomial(n,5); write("b058985.txt", n, " ", a); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 24 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 17 2001
